notesStmt.note: A ḳetubah given by the bridegroom Japheth ben Nissim to Sitt al-Dar daughter of R. Isaac. The document is cut off after seven lines (including the common blessings on the top line). The date, place and names are extant, as is the initial sum- 12 and one half zuz, and 5 dinar; Verso written with a dull reed; verse endings inconsistently denoted with a sof pasuḳ.
